xwikidoc.content: <reid_a> has quit 02:10 <nileshc> has quit 02:34 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 02:53 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 03:09 <Ravneet> has quit 03:16 <SayAsh> has quit 03:33 <gauravsaini03> has quit 03:47 <nileshc> has quit 03:59 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 04:35 <gauravsaini03> has quit 05:00 <IonelPopescu> has quit 06:22 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 06:38 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 06:51 <nileshc> has quit 07:04 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 07:38 <sdumitriu> has quit 07:40 <allasm> has quit 07:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 07:44 <allasm> has joined #phenotips 08:21 <aw1231> has joined #phenotips 08:44 <gauravsaini03> has quit 10:49 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:53 <aw1231> has quit 11:13 <akats> sdumitriu: A user is just a document with a user object attached to it; there is nothing else I need to do for xwiki to consider it a user? 11:13 <sdumitriu> Yes 11:14 <akats> Hmm... 11:25 <SayAsh> Is it mandatory to solve issues for getting selected in GSOC? 11:26 <akats> sdumitriu: Live validation doesn't actually check for a username being taken 11:26 <sdumitriu> SayAsh: There are open easy issues: https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues?labels=easy&page=1&state=open 11:26 <sdumitriu> akats: Hm, that's bad 11:27 <sdumitriu> But we can implement it 11:27 <akats> I knew you were going to say that. 11:27 <akats> I'm on it 11:27 <sdumitriu> SayAsh: I 11:27 <sdumitriu> I'm a bit busy right now, will answer soon 11:31 <SayAsh> fine 11:58 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 12:17 <akats> sdumitriu: in prototype there is a way to disable a DOM element so that it cannot be selected later with $$() 12:17 <sdumitriu> Not that I know of 12:17 <akats> hm... 12:17 <sdumitriu> Why? 12:18 <akats> I can't seem to select a <span>, event though it's there. Interestingly enough, it is set to display:block but is not visible 12:19 <akats> And I'm seeing code like element.disabled in the xwiki javascript 12:20 <vishnu93> has joined #phenotips 12:37 <IonelPopescu> has quit 13:10 <nairboon> has quit 13:51 <mcupak> has quit 14:03 <gauravsaini03> has quit 14:06 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 14:07 <nilesh_> has quit 14:11 <ionel_> has joined #phenotips 14:12 <IonelPopescu> has quit 14:13 <drewson> has joined #phenotips 14:19 <vishnu93> has quit 14:35 <drewson> has quit 14:37 <SayAsh> has quit 14:51 <akats> sdumitriu: Can the message be green? 14:51 <sdumitriu> Validation message? 14:52 <sdumitriu> As in "yay, you managed to find an unused username"? 14:53 <akats> Yes! Ok. I'll figure out how to make it red 14:53 <sdumitriu> You should be able to make it green 14:53 <sdumitriu> I think it's not supposed to be a "validation error" 14:54 <akats> So what you are saying is that I can leave it green 14:55 <sdumitriu> Wait... 14:55 <sdumitriu> I thought you asked me if you can turn it green 14:55 <sdumitriu> Which you can 14:55 <sdumitriu> What's going on there? 15:00 <sdumitriu> http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode?editor=object&classname=XWiki.JavaScriptExtension&object=14 16:21 <akats> sdumitriu: theres no gitignore in phemocentral repo by the way 16:22 <sdumitriu> Yes, you should add one 16:24 <akats> can I just put into master instead of creating a new branch 16:25 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:49 <akats> So I made the commit. I'm not ready to pull yet, because I want to rebuild the whole thing and see it if works. Also I need to make another pull request first for the gitignore.
